bitrate.title: Average Bitrate Bucket
bitrate.description: The average bitrate (in kbps). The value is predefined buckets at 100kbps intervals.

droppedFrames.title: Dropped Frames
droppedFrames.description: The number of frames dropped during playback of the main content.

timeToStart.title: Time To Start
timeToStart.description: Describes the duration (in seconds) passed between video load and start.

bitrateChange.title: Bitrate Changes
bitrateChange.description: The number of bitrate change events that occurred during a playback session.

bitrateAverage.title: Average Bitrate
bitrateAverage.description: A weighted average of all bitrate values related to the play duration that occurred during a playback session.

bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.title: Bitrate Change Impacted Streams
bitrateChangeImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which bitrate changes occurred.

droppedFrameImpactedStreams.title: Dropped Frame Impacted Streams
droppedFrameImpactedStreams.description: The number of streams in which frames were dropped.

bufferCount.title: Buffer Events
bufferCount.description: The number of buffer states that occurred during a playback session.

bufferTime.title: Total Buffer Duration
bufferTime.description: Describes the total amount of time in seconds, spent buffering.

buffer.title: Buffer Impacted Streams
buffer.description: The number of streams impacted by buffering.

error.title: Error Impacted Streams
error.description: The number of streams in which an error event occurred.

errorCount.title: Errors
errorCount.description: The number of errors that were encountered during playback.

playerSdkErrors.title: Player SDK Error IDs
playerSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Player.

externalErrors.title: External Error IDs
externalErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated outside the Player or SDK.

mediaSdkErrors.title: Media SDK Error IDs
mediaSdkErrors.description: The error IDs encountered during a playback session that originated in the Media SDK.

dropBeforeStart.title: Drops Before Starts
dropBeforeStart.description: Indicates the user abandoned the media stream before the first frame for example, during the pre-roll ad break, or due to an error while loading the content from the CDN.

stall.title: Stalling Impacted Streams
stall.description: The number of streams impacted by stalling.

stallCount.title: Stalling Events
stallCount.description: The number of stall states that occurred during a playback session.

stallTime.title: Total Stalling Duration
stallTime.description: Describes the duration in seconds in which the playback was stalled during playback.
